専門家3行コメント.@ja: 新規陽性者数の7日間平均は、9週間連続して増加傾向にある。季節性インフルエンザが流行入りした中、年末年始は警戒感が薄れるおそれもあり、新規陽性者数の増加をできる限り抑制するため、基本に立ち返って、感染防止対策を徹底する必要がある。
専門家3行コメント.@en: The 7-day moving average of new positive cases has been on an increasing trend for 9 consecutive weeks. With the seasonal flu season having already started in Tokyo and the risk of people letting their guard down over the year-end and new year period, there is the need to return to basics and firmly implement infection prevention measures in order to curb the rise in new COVID-19 cases as much as possible.

専門家3行コメント.@ja: 入院患者数は、約4か月ぶりに4,000人を上回った。医療機関では、一般救急受診等の増加や、医療従事者等の就業制限により、通常の医療との両立に支障が生じつつあり、医療提供体制がひっ迫してきている。
専門家3行コメント.@en: The number of hospitalized patients topped 4,000 for the first time in approximately 4 months. An increase in non-COVID emergency patients, along with COVID-19 related work restrictions preventing health care workers and others from reporting to work, is beginning to make it difficult to maintain a balance with the provision of non-COVID health care. This situation is starting to strain the health care delivery system.

display.@ja: 医療体制がひっ迫している
display.@en: The health care delivery system is under strain.
